categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: This Jedi Padawan served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic as a commander during the Clone Wars, and served as the apprentice to Jedi Master Shaak Ti.

In 21 BBY, the Padawan was dispatched to rescue and protect Supreme Chancellor Palpatine in the Galactic Senate on Coruscant when it came under attack, and to uncover the one responsible for the plot. The Padawan served alongside their master Ti as protectors for the Naboo Senator Padmé Amidala during the crisis.

The Padawan would later join Commander Fox and the Coruscant Guard to investigate the plot in the lower levels on Coruscant, and would learn that the assassin Vogg Barakk was in Shack Town. The team captured and interrogated him before learning that Jabba Desilijic Tiure hired him which prompted the Padawan to go to Tatooine to meet with the Hutt. It was there that the Jedi discovered that Asajj Ventress had lied to the Hutt that the Jedi had come to kill him, but the Padawan manages to persuade Jabba otherwise while Ventress fled the planet.
